channel.title: Datmaker - Full Source
channel.description:
Datamaker 1.3 full source code. http://uppit.com/I65SF1 (do a virus scan first)
And before you go asking stupid questions, it's a fucking delphi project. You need delphi 6.0 or later with Gluax installed.
One of you idiots might be able to get it vista compatible(that annoying error), remove the animation (black) triangles and install texture support. Though I doubt it.
Now fuck off.
P.S. Merry Christmas :D

item.title: Datmaker - Full Source
item.dc:creator: @avatarscape avatarscape
item.description:
@avatarscape wrote:

Vista Patch:
When it’s an executable .exe, Right click it, Compatability and click ‘Run using compatability mode for operating system’ then chose windows xp service pack 2, click apply then ok
run and have fun
PS i know this is basic though it does work

Read full topic
